info.title: Sao
info.description: Exposes CMS platform entry and score resources

get.description: List all the ranked entries without their sources.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: Any source code or input that should be compiled, executed or evaluated

get.description: Returns all the entry metadata (without the sources) for the given ID
List all the results delimited by the query params
Returns an specific result with the given entry and testcase ID
List all the scores delimited by the query params
Returns an specific score with the given entry and testcase ID

ComJossemargtSaoEntry.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.com.jossemargt.sao.entry+json; view=default

contestSlug.description: Contest unique and human readble string identifier

href.description: API href for making requests on the entry

ranked.description: Indenties if the entry should be ranked or taken as an user test

taskSlug.description: Task unique and human readble string identifier

ComJossemargtSaoEntry.description: Any source code or input to be compiled, executed and evaluated (default view)

ComJossemargtSaoEntryFull.description: Any source code or input to be compiled, executed and evaluated (full view)

ComJossemargtSaoEntryLinks.title: ComJossemargtSaoEntryLinks

CompilationResult.title: CompilationResult

wallClockTime.description: The spent execution human perceived time

CompilationResult.description: Embedded reprensentation of an entry compilation result

EntryPayload.title: EntryPayload

contestSlug.description: Contest unique and human readble string identifier

ranked.description: Indenties if the entry should be ranked or taken as an user test

taskSlug.description: Task unique and human readble string identifier

EntryPayload.description: Any source code or input that should be compiled, executed or evaluated

EntrySource.title: EntrySource

language.description: Source programming languague or none when using plain text

name.description: Source file name including its extension

EntrySource.description: Entry's embed type which represents a source file

EvaluationResult.title: EvaluationResult
EvaluationResult.description: Embedded reprensentation of an entry evaluation result

ExecutionResult.title: ExecutionResult

wallClockTime.description: The spent execution human perceived time

ExecutionResult.description: Embedded reprensentation of an entry execution result

code.description: an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: Value of ID must be an integer

id.description: a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

meta.description: a meta object containing non-standard meta-information about the error.

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

example.detail: Value of ID must be an integer
